name: Contracting classification premium program
text: [§431:14-103.5]  Contracting classification premium program.  With respect to each classification of risk in the construction industry, the rating organization shall file with the commissioner a contracting classification premium program, which is a method of computing premiums, that does not impose a higher premium solely because of an employer's higher rate of wages. [L 1995, c 234, pt of §5]
